S04bsu037_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye potalakaparvate āryāvalokiteśvarāyatane divyamaṇiratnaśrīindranīlamaye puṣpasaṃstṛte devasiṃhāsane bhagavān sārdhaṃ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena pañcamātrairbhikṣuśataiḥ sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravaiścetovaśitāprāptaiḥ saddharmapāraṃgataiśca sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sarvaiḥ mahākaruṇājñānaprāptaiḥ sarvaiḥ ekajātipratibaddhairdvijātibhyāṃ ca trijātibhirdaśajātibhirviśatijātibhistriṃśajjātibhiḥ śatajātibhirvā pratibaddhaiḥ sarvaiḥ aṣṭaphalaprāptairdaśabhūmisthitaiḥ tad yathā āryāvalokiteśvareṇa maṃjuśriyāvimalaketunā ratnaśriyā vajraketunā vimalaprabheṇa candanena amṛtaketunā evaṃpramukhaiḥ saptaśataiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ sārdham upāsakopāsikābhiḥ sarvaiśca vyākṛtaiḥ samādhiprāptaiḥ nānālokadhātubhiḥ sannipatitaiḥ pañcasahasraiḥ sarvaiḥ gandharvaśatasahasraiḥ pūrvabuddhaparyupāsitaiḥ
S04bsu037_u:1_1: tathāgataprātihāryadṛṣṭaiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvābhiḥ mahāyakṣiṇībhiḥ bodhisattvajñānaprāptābhiḥ vyākaraṇaprāptābhiravaivartikābhiḥ anaupamyayā vimalaprabhayā ca prabhāvatyā bhīmaśriyā yakṣiṇyā ca evaṃpramukhābhiraśītyā mahāyakṣiṇībhiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:2_0: atha taiḥ sarvaistathāgataṃ siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ jñātvā svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaistathāgataṃ divyālaṃkāravastrapuṣpamālyadhūpavilepanavādyaśabdena mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ śatasahasrakoṭiśaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya arcitaśca /
S04bsu037_u:2_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān sarvasattvamahākaruṇājñānasthitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:2_2: tena samādhidhāraṇabalena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātavaḥ ābhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan /
S04bsu037_u:2_3: sarvarūpāṇi sphuṭitāni / ye ca sattvā jātyandhāḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:2_10: sattvānāṃ yaḥ khalu dhanavastubhogavihīna āsīt sa dhanavastubhogasampanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:2_12: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye kecit sattvā anuśāsanadharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:2_13: ye sattvāḥ [Dutt_50] devabhūtāste sarvadevasukhaṃ saṃprahāya buddhānusmṛtiṃ kṛtvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:2_14: ye sattvā manuṣyabhūtāste ca manuṣyasukhaṃ parityajya dharmaśravaṇakāmāya yena bhagavāṃstena upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:2_15: ye sattvā nāgayakṣarākṣasapretapiśācabhūtāste buddhānusmṛtiṃ prāpya sarvasattveṣu maitracittā bhūtvā kāyacittasukhaṃ labdhvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:2_16: ye sattvā yamaloke andhatamisrāyāṃ jātāste 'pi buddhānubhāvena ekakṣaṇaṃ smṛtiṃ labdhvā parasparaṃ saṃjānate sma /
S04bsu037_u:2_20: tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampate unnamati avanamati sma /
S04bsu037_u:2_21: atha tasyāṃ parṣadi maṃjuśrīkumārabhūtaḥ sanniṣaṇṇaḥ san bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāryāvalokiteśvarametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:2_22: kulaputra mahābodhisattvaparṣadi avabhāsitāyāṃ mahāparṣadaḥ pūrvanimittaṃ parisphuṭam /
S04bsu037_u:2_25: kulaputra anekānāṃ ca bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvāśāparipūri mahājñānapratilambho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:2_26: tat kulaputra sattvānāṃ kāruṇyamutpādya hitāya sukhāya yāvadanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpanāya tathāgataṃ paripṛccha /
S04bsu037_u:3_0: santi kulaputra sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye bhaviṣyanti pāpakāriṇo daridrāḥ kṛśā durvarṇaśarīrā jarāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ parīttabhogā aparibhāvitakāyā alpāyuṣkā alpabuddhayo rāgadveṣamohaparipīḍitāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:3_1: teṣāmarthāya kulaputra tathāgatamadhyeṣaya dharmadeśanāyai tat te kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātraṃ sattvānā[marthāya] hitāya sukhāya sarvāvyādhipraśamanāya sarvapāpanivāraṇāya sarvapāpapraśamanāya sarvaśāparipūraṇārthaṃ yāvadanuttaraparinirvāṇārtham /
S04bsu037_u:7_0: atha āryāvalokiśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśadiśamavalokya gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatakoṭīrmamanasi kurvan yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:7_1: santi bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle bhaviṣyanti jarāvyādhiśokamṛtyu[duḥkha]kālamṛtyuparipīḍitāḥ kṛśā durvarṇā alpāyuṣkāḥ parīttabhogā aparibhāvitakāyāste parasparāṇi mātsaryadauḥśīlyacittatayā ghātayiṣyanti parasparāṇi dhanabhogaiśvaryāṇyāpahariṣyanti hāsyalāsyanāṭyakrīḍābhiratāḥ anitye nityasaṃjñinaḥ aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:7_3: tat teṣāmahaṃ bhagavan arthāya hitāya sarvāśāparipūrarṇārthaṃ yāvat tathāgatajñānāharaṇārthaṃ buddhakṣetropapattaye sarvapāpanivāraṇārthaṃ tathāgatamadhyeṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:7_4: bhāṣasva bhagavan bhāṣasva sugato nāsti tathāgatasya tajjñānaṃ yadaviditam adṛṣṭam aśrutam avijñātameva /
S04bsu037_u:7_5: bahavo bhagavan bodhisattvabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā devanāgā yakṣagandharvāsurakinnarāśca samāgatā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ śrotukāmāḥ pūrvabuddhaparyupāsitāḥ saprajñā jātāḥ te nirāśībhūtā prakramiṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:8_0: atha te sarve yathā samāgatāḥ parṣat paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya ekakaṇṭhena evamāhuḥ /
S04bsu037_u:8_1: sādhu bhagavan bhāṣasva bhagavan bhāṣasva sugataḥ /
S04bsu037_u:9_0: [Dutt_52] atha bhagavān dvirapi trirapi adhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā daśadiśamavalokya valgumaṇojñasvareṇāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:9_1: asti kulaputra sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānsattvāvalokanabuddhakṣetrasandarśanavyūho nāma samādhiḥ yo mayā pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya śrutaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:9_3: tat sahaśravaṇādeva tasya samādhernāmadheyasya navatīnāṃ sattvakoṭīnāṃ tathāgatajñānapratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:9_6: tat smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra divyena tathāgatajñānena triṃśatyā tathāgatasahasrairayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣitaḥ sattvānāmarthāya /
S04bsu037_u:9_8: ayaṃ ca yathā samāgatā sarvabodhisattvānāṃ parṣad bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā parṣad[ete sarve]śrutvā mānanāṃ pūjanāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:9_11: sarvakāmaṃ gatāḥ kṛtasarvāśāḥ samṛdhyante vigatavyādhayaḥ saṃvṛttā paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ sarvāvaraṇaprahīṇā abhirūpaprāsādikadarśanīyā dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddhāḥ sarvarājarājaputrāmatyābhinandanīyāḥ sarvasattvairvandanīyāḥ [Dutt_53] smṛtimantaḥ prajñāvantaḥ buddhe dhama saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dhṛtimantaḥ āyurvarṇatejobalarathāmavantaḥ sarvākāravaropetāḥ samanvāgatāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:9_12: na ca kadācit priyaviprayogaṃ na priyavyasanaṃ saṃvṛttam /
S04bsu037_u:9_13: evaṃ kulaputra bahuguṇasasanvāgatāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:9_14: yadā saddharmaparyāyaṃ paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacchatradhvajapatākaiḥ samalaṃkṛtya namo buddhāyeti kṛtvā namaskariṣyanti sādhukāraṃ dāsyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti vācāpayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti paramagauravaṃ cittamutpādya tasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike te dṛṣṭa eva dharme sarvasaguṇasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vigatavyādhayo dīrghāyuṣkāḥ sthirabuddhayaḥ smṛtimantaḥ dhṛtimantaḥ sarvarājānāṃ sarvarājñīnāṃ rājaputrāmātyānāṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cābhinandanīyā bhaviṣyanti vandanīyāḥ satkaraṇīyāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:9_19: sarvāvaraṇaṃ cāsya kṣayaṃ cāsyanti paṃcānantaryaprabhṛtayaḥ kṛtvā /
S04bsu037_u:9_22: na īrṣyāluko na vikṣepacittaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:9_23: yāvaccyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadyate vyākṛtāste mayā kulaputra saṃmukhavyākaraṇena /
S04bsu037_u:9_26: bodhau ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti satkṛtya likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ ca
S04bsu037_u:9_27: śroṣyanti / bodhisattva iti sa manasi kṛtvā satkartavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:9_28: yenāsya pūvakarmavipākenāsya rūpavaikalyaṃ bhogavaikalyaṃ buddhivaikalyaṃ paribhāṣyaṃ ca priyaviprayogaṃ ca rājyakṣobhaṃ ca te asya samādheranubhāvena śravaṇena kecicchīrṣarogeṇa kecidbhaktacchedena kecit kucelābhidhāraṇena kecit kāyacittapīḍena kecit duḥkhasaṃsparśaśayyākalpanena kecit paribhāṣyeṇa sarvaṃ tat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:9_29: tena cavaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ pāpamakuśalaṃ sattveṣu nānāprakāramupacitaṃ taṃ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmi /
S04bsu037_u:9_31: yeca tasya kulaputrasya kuluduhiturvā chedabhogaphalaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ [Dutt_55] karmāvaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati buddhe vā dharme vā saṃghe vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhe vā mātāpitṛbhirvā [pāpa]karmakṛtamupacittaṃ bhaviṣyati tat sarva parikṣayaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu037_u:9_33: ye ca tasya kulaputrasya ca kuladuhiturvā duḥkhanārakavedanīyaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati priyaviprayogasaṃvartanīyaṃ jātyandhasaṃvartanīyaṃ strīsaṃvartanīyaṃ dvivyaṃjanasaṃvartanīyaṃ īrṣyāmānakrodhavaśena yamalokapretatiryagyonisaṃvartanīyaṃ tat sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu037_u:10_2: sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sarvaśāparipūrakarāṇi mahābhogaiśvaryasukhakarāṇi sarvacintitaprārthitasamṛddhikarāṇi sarvakarmakṣayaṃkarāṇi sarvākālamṛtyuduḥsvapnasarvavyādhipraśamanakarāṇī sarvayuddhajayaṃkarāṇi āyurvarṇabalavīryasthāmakarāṇi sarvayakṣabhūtamanuṣyavaśaṃkarāṇi sarvajvarāviṣādakapraśamanakarāṇi yāvadvyākaraṇapratilaṃbhakarāṇi dhāraṇīmantrapadāni yāni śrutvā dhāritvā vācitvā satkaritvā likhitvā likhapayitvā guptaye /
S04bsu037_u:10_3: sa te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraśca sarvānetān guṇān pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:10_4: atha tasmin samaye iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāramakaṃpata /
S04bsu037_u:10_5: sā ca yathā samāgatā parṣat tathāgataṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyaduṣyayugaiḥ saṃcchādya sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:10_6: sādhu sādhu bhagavan katamāni tāni mantrapadāni /
S04bsu037_u:11_2: sarvaśāparipūraṇe dyutindhare narake ca pūjite tathāgatajñānadade tathāgatādhiṣṭhāne ca /
S04bsu037_u:13_0: imāni tāni kulaputrāho mantrapadāni triṃśatyā tathāgatasahasrairbhāṣitāni adhiṣṭhitāni mayāpyetarhi bhāṣitā[ni] sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye sarvavyādhipraśamanakarāṇi buddhakṣetropapattaye /
S04bsu037_u:13_1: yaḥ kaścit parṣa evaṃ jānīyuḥ kathaṃ nu vayaṃ sarvānetān tathāgatabhāṣitān guṇān pratilabheya tena kalyamevotthāya sarvasattvānāṃ dayācittena karūṇācittena maitracittena īrṣyāmānamrakṣakrodhaparivarjitena ekāgracittena buddhasyodāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā daśadiśaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ namaskṛtvā yathākāmaṃ guṇān manasikṛtya aṣṭaśataṃ japya puṣpamekaikaṃ tathāgate deyam /
S04bsu037_u:14_0: [Dutt_57] asyāṃ khalu punardhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ ṣaṣṭīnāṃ ca prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:14_1: sarve ca sarva[karmā] varaṇavinirmuktāḥ sarvābhiprāyaparipūrṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:17_0: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:17_1: asti bhagavan abhayatejaṃ nāma dhāraṇī bodhisattvānāṃ pratijñā yā mayā abhayavyūharājasya tathāgatasyāntikādudgṛhītā /
S04bsu037_u:17_3: tataḥ punaḥ bhagavan nābhijānābhi yasya svapne 'pi sā dhāraṇī karṇapuṭe nipatitāntargatā tasya syāccharīre daurbalyaṃ vā kleśo vā vyādhirvā jvaro vā kāyaśūlaṃ vā cittapīḍā vā akālamṛtyurvā udakaṃ vā śastraṃ vā viṣaṃ vā garaṃ vā ḍākinī vā bhūto vā yakṣo vā śatravo vā manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā viheṭhaṃ vā kartuṃ hiṃsāṃ vā vidhātuṃ vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04bsu037_u:17_5: teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāmarthāya śrotṝṇāṃ mānayitṝṇāṃ pūjayitṝṇāṃ dhārayitṝṇāṃ vācayitṝṇāṃ sarvāśāparipūrakarāṇi /
S04bsu037_u:18_1: tadyathā om vajradhara vajradhara vajrakāya vajrabala vajrateja /
S04bsu037_u:20_1: he he / turu turu / āgaccha āgaccha / mā vilamba / darśaya vajrakāyaṃ darśaya vajrakāyam /
S04bsu037_u:21_0: asyāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī unmajjanimajjanaṃ karotu /
S04bsu037_u:21_1: sarve ca yakṣarākṣasāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ sarve ca devā yāvad manuṣyāmanuṣyā vismayamāpannāḥ sādhukāraṃ pradadati /
S04bsu037_u:21_2: sādhu sādhu mahāsattvāḥ paramasiddhāni imāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣitāni /
S04bsu037_u:21_4: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūmimabhiprārthayate dhanadhānyabhogaiśvaryaṃ rājyaṃ vidyādharatvam āyurbalavīryadīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ tena śuklāṣṭamyāṃ śvetacandanamayo vajradharaḥ kāryaḥ aṭṭahāsaḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:21_5: sadhātukahṛdayaṃ kartavyam / sadhātukaṃ vajra[dharaṃ] samāśvāsakaṃ vidyādharaṃ dhūpadahyamānaṃ śucinā ahorātroṣitena kāryam /
S04bsu037_u:21_6: tato 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvasecaṃ [Dutt_59] kṛtvā śuce satathāgatasthāne mahatā dhūpapuṣpagandhadīpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvā aṣṭaśatiko jāpo dātavyaḥ tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:21_7: sarvatathāgatānāṃ namaskṛtya catvāri pūrṇakumbhā[ni]sthāpya raktacandanamayaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā śvetavastrāprāvṛtena ekāgramānasena caturdiśe ca rasagandhamadyapāyasavaliṃ dattvā aṣṭaśatasumanaḥpuṣpaiḥ vajrapāṇirāhartavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:21_8: yāvat pañcadaśī tato mahānirghoṣo bhaviṣyati pṛthivīkampaśca raśmayo niścariṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:21_12: guṇasahasraṃ pratilapsyate / maraṇakāle ca buddhaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu037_u:21_13: ahaṃ ca darśanaṃ dāsyāmi / atha bhagavān sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:21_14: sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe anatikramaṇīyā iyaṃ mudrā /
S04bsu037_u:21_15: nātra kāṃkṣā na vimatirna vicikitsā kartavyā sadevakena lokena /
S04bsu037_u:24_2: bhagavānāha / sarvatathāgatānāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ [Dutt_60] sarvabodhisattvānām adhiṣṭhitaśca sarvasamādhiṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni pratilabhate /
S04bsu037_u:24_4: devānāṃ nāgānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ pretānāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ yāmalaukikānām amī sattvāḥ puṇyopagāḥ sukṛtakarā buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:24_6: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpadṛṣṭigatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sarvapāpebhyo nivārayati /
S04bsu037_u:24_9: te ca sattvā buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaṃ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṣupapadyante /
S04bsu037_u:25_2: kiṃ duṣkaracaryā / duṣkaraṃ ca bhagavan arhattvaṃ prāgevānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:25_3: bhagavānāha / yaśca mayā kulaputra prathamacittotpādamupādāya dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitā paripūritā yaśca śiraḥkara caraṇanayanottamāṃgapriyaputrabhāryāduhitṛdāsadāsīparityāga kṛtaḥ yaścāsya dharmaparyāyasya [Dutt_61] pūjanasatkaraṇalikhanalekhāpanavācanodgrahaṇīyaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanīyaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāṃ pūjanasatkaraṇapuṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ tasyāyaṃ pūrvimakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti /
S04bsu037_u:25_4: yaśca mayā kulaputra dharmo bhāṣitaḥ paryāvāptaḥ taṃ sarvaṃ satkare gurukare mānaye pūjaye satkṛtya likhaye likhāpaye /
S04bsu037_u:25_5: yaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ likhe vācaye pūjaye saṃprakāśaye bahutaram itaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ parigrahīṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:25_7: tat kasya hetoḥ / evaṃrūpasya duṣkaraṃ dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇapūjanalikhanam /
S04bsu037_u:25_8: te ca sattvāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ khādyapeyahāsyanāṭyābhiratā aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ kāmakrodhavyāpādabahulā asukhe sukhasaṃjñinaḥ prahārākrośatarjanatāḍanābhiratā na jñāsyanti na manasi kariṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:25_9: te tataḥ pāpakarmanidānājñānā akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā jarāvyādhiśokamṛtyuparipīḍitā maraṇakāle paritarpyante /
S04bsu037_u:25_10: śmaśānasadṛśamaṃcāvalaṃvyamānaṃ parasparaṃ paśyanti na ca kuśalacittamutpādayiṣyanti nābhedyaprasādam /
S04bsu037_u:25_12: nāyaṃ kulaputrākṛtakuśalamūlaistathāgatādarśāvino [Dutt_62] avyākaraṇaprāptaiḥ śrotuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum udgrahītuṃ na likhituṃ na likhāpayituṃ na śraddhadhātuṃ na ca tān dharmabhāṇakān satkartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum [api na śakyate /
S04bsu037_u:25_13: ] tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kulaputra tatra viṣaye bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:25_14: atha sā yathā samāgatā parṣat sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:25_15: sādhu sādhu bhagavan / vayamapi bhagavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikaṃ tathāgatakṛtyena satkariṣyāmaḥ gurūkariṣyāmaḥ mānayiṣyāmaḥ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ cāsyopasaṃhariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:25_16: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaṃ vaistarikīkariṣyāmaḥ rakṣiṣyāmaḥ yenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaściraśtitiko bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:25_17: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yathā samāgatāṃ parṣadamavalokyaivamāhuḥ /
S04bsu037_u:25_18: sādhu sādhu kulaputra / aho evamapi yuṣmākaṃ karaṇīyam /
S04bsu037_u:25_19: kāyacittanirapekṣairbhūtvā sarvopaplavanaparibhavanaparibhāṣaṇatarjanaprahārākrośalabhyamānam [api] imaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrāvayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:25_20: taṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena copasthātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:25_21: sa ca viṣayaḥ sa ca dvīpaḥ sa ca nagaro rakṣitavyaḥ sarvabhayopadravopasargopāyāsebhyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:25_22: tasya ca kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā satatasamitaṃ samanvāhartavyam /
S04bsu037_u:26_0: śṛṇuta kulaputra apramattā mā paścakāle parittāpyu bheṣyatha /
S04bsu037_u:26_1: buddhasya utpādyu kadāci labhyate kalpānakoṭībhi śataiḥ sahasraiḥ //
S04bsu037_u:26_2: guṇāśca śṛṇvatvabhiśraddadheta na durlabhā teṣu samādhi bheṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:26_3: kalpānakoṭīn yatha gaṅgavālikā yo dānu dadyā dvipadottameṣu //
S04bsu037_u:26_4: dhanaṃ cā dhānyaṃ tatha vastrabhūṣaṇaṃ gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca /
S04bsu037_u:26_6: na tasya puṇyasya pramāṇu vidyate tā cāpramāṇaṃ sugatena deśitam //
S04bsu037_u:26_7: raṇyaṃ ca seveta sadāpramatto dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyetu sadānyacittaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:26_8: dānaṃ ca dadyā priyaputradhītarā hastau ca pādau ca parityajeta //
S04bsu037_u:26_10: yathaiva sūtrasya dhareti kaści ayaṃ tato puṇyaviśeṣyu prāpnuyā /
S04bsu037_u:26_11: arthasya dātā varasūtrametat sarvasyāpāyā sadā varjitāsya //
S04bsu037_u:26_12: dhanasya dhānyasya ca dāyako hyayaṃ guṇāśca sarve 'pi na tasya durlabhāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:26_13: āyurbalaṃ vīryu na tasya durlabhaṃ dhāreti sūtraṃ ya imaṃ viśuddham //
S04bsu037_u:26_14: drakṣyanti buddhamamitābhu nāyakaṃ mayāpi sa vyākṛtu buddhabodhau /
S04bsu037_u:26_15: na tasya pāpaṃ pi kadāci vidyate sukhāvatīṃ drakṣyati lokadhātum //
S04bsu037_u:26_16: yaṃ cāpi tasya sada karmu bheṣyati sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati cittanīḍe /
S04bsu037_u:26_17: kāyasya śūle tatha śīrṣatāpe na tasya jātu vinipātu bheṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:26_18: sāṃdṛṣṭikāṃścāpi guṇāṃ sa lapsyate sarvaṃ yathā cintitu prārthitaṃ ca //
S04bsu037_u:26_19: tasmābhi tebhi sada bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsika rājabhiḥ sadā /
S04bsu037_u:26_20: gurugauravaṃ kṛtvā ca dharmabhāṇake yathā narendrasya tathāgatasya //
S04bsu037_u:26_22: idaṃ ca sūtraṃ sada dhāritavyaṃ satkāru nityaṃ ca kartavyadhārake /
S04bsu037_u:26_23: gandhaiśca mālyaiśca vilepanaiśca satkāru kṛtvā ca likhāpayeta //
S04bsu037_u:26_25: narakeṣu tiryakṣu paribhramāṇāḥ ṣaṇḍhāśca paṇḍāśca jugupsanīyāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:26_26: jātyandhabhūtāḥ kuṇapāśca gandhinaḥ saṃjāsyate nīcakuleṣu strīṣu //
S04bsu037_u:26_27: īrṣyālukasya sada pāpacāriṇaḥ krodhābhibhūtasya ca matsariṣya /
S04bsu037_u:26_28: buddheṣu dharmeṣu karitva gauravam imeṣu jātīṣūpapadyate 'sau /
S04bsu037_u:26_29: tatraiva duḥkhāni ca vedamānā mā paścakāle paritāpyu bheṣyatha //
S04bsu037_u:26_30: tasmābhi tehi sada pūjitasya yaścaiva dhāreta prakāśayeta /
S04bsu037_u:26_31: yaścaiva paribhāṣaṇu tasya kurvate jugupsanāṃ tāḍanabandhanañca //
S04bsu037_u:26_33: mamaiva tena paribhāṣaṇā kṛtā mamaiva satkāru karitva dhārake /
S04bsu037_u:26_34: tasmācca tairhi sada dharmabhāṇake yaścaiva dhāreta likheta vācaye /
S04bsu037_u:26_35: satkāru taiśca sad anityu kuryā srigdhāśca vāco madhurā bhaṇeta //
S04bsu037_u:29_1: anusmarāmyahaṃ bhagavan asti vyavalokanaprātihāryā nāma dhāraṇī yā mayā pūrvaṃ jñānaketuprabhākarasya tathāgatasyāntikādudgṛhītā śrutā[ca] /
S04bsu037_u:29_2: yāṃ śrutvā matvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā satkaritvā likhitvā likhāpayitvā avaivartikabhūmiṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:29_6: samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate / vigatā vyādhayo bhavanti / buddhadarśanaṃ bodhisattvadarśanaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu037_u:29_8: sādhu sādhu kulaputra pravartaya adhiṣṭhitaṃ tathāgatena /
S04bsu037_u:30_0: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ sarvatathāgatebhyo namaskṛtya imāni mantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /
S04bsu037_u:32_0: ha ha ha ha / mama mama / dhiri dhiri / śānte praśānte sarvapāpakṣayaṃkare /
S04bsu037_u:32_2: vyavalokaya māṃ smara smara yat tvayā pūrvaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu037_u:32_4: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhaya / mā me kaścid viheṭhaṃ karotu /
S04bsu037_u:33_0: teje teje mahāteje / yanmama kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ dāridrayaṃ vā tanme kṣapaya /
S04bsu037_u:33_4: namaḥ sarvatathāgatānām / namaḥ avalokiteśvarasya / smara pratijñā mahāsattvāḥ / sidhyantu mantrapadāḥ svāhā /
S04bsu037_u:34_2: sādhu sādhu subhāṣitamidaṃ mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇārthaṃ sarvāśāparipūrakaram /
S04bsu037_u:34_5: avalokiteśvara āha / yaḥ kaścit kulaputra imān guṇānabhikāṃkṣa[te] /
S04bsu037_u:34_6: yathā tathāgatena parikirtitaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ mama kāṃkṣa[te] /
S04bsu037_u:34_7: mamāpi sammukhadarśanaṃ samādhilambhaṃ buddhabodhisattvadarśanaṃ [Dutt_68] bhogaiśvaryalambhaṃ buddhakṣetropapattiṃ tena śuklapakṣe śucinā susnātagātreṇa bhūtvā āryāṣṭāṃgopavāsopavasitairaṣṭamyāmārabhya śucau pradeśe buddhādhiṣṭhite gandhapuṣpairdhvajapatākaiḥ pūrṇakumbhairabhyarcya sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ sa ca dharmabhāṇakaḥ śuciḥ susnātagātraḥ śvetavastraprāvṛto nānāpuṣpamālyagandhairabhyarcya likhāpayitavyaḥ sarvasattvāsādhāraṇāni kuśalamūlāni kṛtvā sarvasattvamaitracittena dayācittena karuṇācittena tathāgatagurugauravaṃ cittamupasthāpya tena dine dine likhatā tāva likhe yāvadardhadivasam /
S04bsu037_u:34_8: aṣṭamyāmārabhya yāvat pañcadaśīṃ dine dine saiva pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:34_9: tato 'nenaiva vidhinā likhitamātreṇa pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi sarvapāpāni cāsya kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:34_13: tena likhāpayitvā pūrvamukhīṃ sadhātukāṃ tathāgatapratimāmavalokiteśvarapratimāṃ ca sadhātukāṃ sthāpya sadhātukeai caitāyatane puṣpadhūpagandhairdīpaiśca udāratarā pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:34_15: śuciśuklabhojinā āryāṣṭāṃgopavāsopavasitena suhṛtsahāyakena mānakrodhamātsaryaparivarjitena dine dine udāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā trisandhyaṃ jāpaḥ aṣṭaśatiko dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:34_18: daśadiśamabhinamaskṛtya paścimena bhīmāyā devyāḥ pūrveṇānopamāyāḥ ūrdhvena śaṃkhinyā balirnānārasapāyasadadhyodanaścaturdiśaṃ kṣeptavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:34_20: saṃtrāso ['pi notpadyate /] nānyathātvaṃ cittasya / sarveṣāṃ cāṣṭaśatiko jāpaḥ aṣṭaśatasumanaḥpuṣpaiśca saṃcodanam /
S04bsu037_u:34_21: [ane]naiva vidhinā pūrvasecaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ catvāri pūrṇakuṃbhā[ni]sthāpya dhūpacandanakundurukakarpūraṃ dattvā dīpa[mukhāni] catvāri nānāgandhadhvajapaṭapatākāsuvarṇarūpyabhāṇḍaiḥ taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ samalaṃkṛtya dadhimadhupāyasadadhyodanamanyāni ca yathālambhena baliṃ caturdiśe dattvā nivedya sumanaḥpuṣpāṣṭakaśatairekaikaṃ japya caturdiśe kṣeptavyam /
S04bsu037_u:34_22: pūrvavat tryaṣṭaśataiḥ sumanojātipuṣpairekaikaṃ japya āryāvalokiteśvarapratimā āhartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:34_24: mahānirghoṣo bhaviṣyati / raśmayo niścariṣyanti / pṛthivīkampaḥ [bhaviṣyati /] tataḥ sarvakarmāṇi sarvakāryāṇi cāsya samṛddhiṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:34_29: mahādṛḍhabalavīryasaṃpannastejavāṃstīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān sarvasattvadayācitto dharmajño yāvaccyavanakāle buddhaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ paśyati /
S04bsu037_u:34_30: maitravihārī kālaṃ karoti / dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ yathepsiteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu mahācakravartikuleṣu yatrānusmṛtiṃ karoti tatropapadyate /
S04bsu037_u:34_33: imāni te dhāraṇīmantrapadāni na vinā tathāgatādhiṣṭhānasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śakyaṃ śrotuṃ na dhārayituṃ na pūjayituṃ na likhituṃ na likhāyituṃ na śraddadhātum /
S04bsu037_u:34_34: sace darśanaṃ bhave na śravaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:34_35: sace śravaṇaṃ tadvikṣiptacittaḥ śroṣyati na śraddhāsyati na satkariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:34_36: sace satkare kleśavyāpādacittaḥ[satkariṣyati] sace likhe likhāpayeta vyākṣiptacittaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:34_37: [tat kasya hetoḥ] / tathā hi tasya pūrvapāpakarmaphalahetutvāt karmānubhavitavyam /
S04bsu037_u:34_42: sādhu sādhu kulaputra / tathāgatakṛtyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ kariṣyati sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu037_u:38_2: evaṃ smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanmayā bhagavataḥ kauśāmbyāṃ ghoṣilasyārāme viharataḥ purataḥ pratijñā samudāhṛtā sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S04bsu037_u:38_4: tanme bhagavānanujānātu bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya sarvāśāparipūraṇārthāya bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ ca /
S04bsu037_u:39_1: hī hī / hu hu / sara sara / lahuṃ lahuṃ / śīghraṃ śīghraṃ / mahāvidye sarvavidyādharanamaskṛte /
S04bsu037_u:39_2: hasaḥ hasaḥ / kiṃ tiṣṭhasi kiṃ tiṣṭhasi / kanakavicitrābharaṇavibhūṣitāṃgi paṭa paṭa /
S04bsu037_u:41_1: padme padme mahāpadme / viśade viśade mahāviśade / bhava bhava bhavodbhavāya / tamahaṃ ghore tamahaṃ ghore /
S04bsu037_u:41_3: siddhiṃ kuru / sarvaśāṃ me paripūraya buddhādhiṣṭhānena svāhā /
S04bsu037_u:42_0: yaḥ kaścidbhagavadguṇārthī dhanadhānyārthī sarvasattvavaśīkaraṇārthī bhave mahaiśvaryaṃ rājatvaṃ vidyādharatvamabhikāṃkṣa[te]mamāpi saṃmukhadarśanaṃ tena aṣṭamyāṃ śuklapakṣe nave paṭake acchinnadaśe keśāpagate śucinā citrakareṇa āryāṣṭāṅgopavāsopavasitena aśleṣairaṅgairnavabhājanasthaiścitrāpayitavyam /
S04bsu037_u:42_1: madhye tathāgatapratimā dharmaṃ deśayamānā dakṣiṇenāryavajrakrodho vajraṃ bhrāmayamānaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ[puṣpa]mālyārdhacandrahāraḥ śvetavastraprāvṛtaḥ vāmapārśve anopamā śarakāṇḍagaurī sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā śvetavastrā padmahastā samāśvāsayaṃtī /
S04bsu037_u:42_2: tataḥ śucinā vidyādhareṇa āryāṣṭāṅgopavasitena śucau sadhātuke tathāgatasthāne kṣīrayāvakāhāreṇa śvetavastraprāvṛtenātmadvitīyena aṣṭamyāṃ pūrvasecaṃ kṛtvā nānāpuṣpagandhadhūpadīpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvā tryaṣṭaśatiko jāpo dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:42_3: ekaikaṃ sumanaḥpuṣpaṃ jāpya tryaṣṭaśataiḥ sā pratimā āhartavyā tathāgatasya vajrapāṇeśca pūrvataraṃ puṣpadhūpagandhaṃ dātavyam /
S04bsu037_u:42_5: pūrṇapañcadaśyāmanenaiva vidhinā baliḥ anyā[ni] ca yathālābhena dhūpakarpūrakundurukacandanamrakṣaṃ dātavyam /
S04bsu037_u:42_8: yathepsitaṃ varaṃ dāsyāmi samādhilābhamākāśagamanamantardhānaṃ rājatvaṃ balacakravartitvaṃ vidyādharatvaṃ nidhivādaṃ dhātuvādaṃ paracittajñānaṃ dīrghāyuṣkatvam /
S04bsu037_u:42_12: yadi cāhaṃ bhagavan pañcānantaryaṃ kariṣyāmi tribhiḥ sādhanairna samanvāherayaṃ mā cāhaṃ bhagavannanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ sace buddhe aprasādalabdho bhave yaśca vimatiprāpto yaścaṃ pāpamakuśalaṃ kṛtvā na viratimanugṛṇhāti kleśopakleśacittastasyāhaṃ cāpi darśanaṃ dāsyāmi lābhamapi kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:43_1: sādhu sādhu bhagini / sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagini yattvayā sarvasattvānāmarthāya pāpasamācāreṣu [Dutt_74] sattveṣu imā evaṃrūpā mantrapadā bhāṣitāḥ pratijñā kṛtā /
S04bsu037_u:43_2: śakṣyasi tvamanayā evaṃrūpayā mahākaruṇayā sarvasattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prati[ṣṭhā]payitum /
S04bsu037_u:44_0: atha śaṃkhini mahādevī bhagavantaṃ nānāpuṣpairnānāgandhairabhyarcya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādaryonipatya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:44_2: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāṃ sarvāśāparipūrakarāṇi mantrapadāni dāsyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:45_2: tiṣṭha dhane dhanajaye / vṛ vṛ vṛddhikari / dhṛ dhṛ dhṛtikari / nānāvividhaveśavastrāyudhadhāriṇi /
S04bsu037_u:45_3: yu yu āyuṣpālani / tathāgatānāṃ smara bodhicittaṃ mā vilamba /
S04bsu037_u:46_2: aṣṭaśatajaptena yathālābhena baliṃ dattvā caturdiśe dhūpaṃ kundurukaṃ tathāgatasyodāratarapūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:46_3: dīpo [Dutt_75] dātavyaḥ / ekaviṃśatidivasāni maitravihāriṇā niyamasthena bhavitavyam /
